column2: You must defeat Gorseval the Multifarious to purchase this item.
Used in the crafting of armor with +Toughness, +Condition Damage, +Expertise, and +Vitality.
Used in the crafting of armor with +Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality.
Defeat the Toxic Alchemist in Kessex Hills and loot this from her corpse.
Dropped by the Reef Shark in Sawtooth Bay at Southsun Cove.
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear near the chest at the end of Wall Breach Blitz in Diessa Plateau.
Gathered by looting the Legendary Imbued Shaman in the Volcanic Fractal while having the Mists Imbued Jar in your inventory.
After obtaining the incomplete catalytic converter, gather Mordremoth's core by slaying the Elder Dragon in Dragon's Stand.
You'll miss it the first time.
The Construct's core has been retrieved.
Year of the Ascension Part III
After feeding, housing, and teaching your raven to fly, speak to Moda the Quick in the Raven Lodge in Hoelbrak.
You can now purchase components necessary for the creation of Heart of Thorns legendary weapons from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Used in the crafting of armor with +Toughness, +Healing Power, and +Concentration.
Double-click to combine a Sulfuric Egg, Slimemold, Crystallized Chaos, and Naphthenic Acid in an Empty Hylek Flask to create the Concentrated Volatile Substance.
Completed by combining with the jungle dragon cores at the Ancient Power Core inside the secret lab under the Decayed Hive in Tangled Depths.
Used in the crafting of weapons with +Expertise, +Vitality, and +Precision.
With the Crystallized Magic in your inventory, gather chaotic ectoplasmic energy by looting the Ascalonian ghosts found at the Old Piken Ruins in Iron Marches.
Gather four soul energies to power the Soul Battery Fragment.
A recipe to make Rune-Enchanted Rings.
Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. Infuses armor with a spiritual aura.
Used in the crafting of weapons with +Expertise, +Vitality, and +Precision.
Used in the crafting of weapons with +Power, +Toughness, +Concentration, and +Expertise.

Use the Searing Cauldron near Ironhead Lake in Iron Marches to combine the Wyvern's Liquid Fire, Elemental Flames, Destroyer's Heat, a Flame Effigy Embers, and a Fire Imbued Heart to create the Ultra Hot Sphere.
Used in the crafting of weapons with +Power, +Precision, +Toughness, and +Concentration.
Used in the crafting of weapons with +Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality.
Found by looting the chest in Spekk's Laboratory in Caledon Forest.
Cannot use this item without being near Atlalli, the Master Alchemist in Timberline Falls.

Take the Concentrated Volatile Substance, Ichor Alkahest, Arachnid Venom Decanter, and Concentrated Maguuma Bacteria to the Alchemy Mixing Table near Atlalli, Master Alchemist in the Hunting Banks of Timberline Falls, to create the Alchemical Catalyst.
A recipe to make an ascended inscription for crafting weapons with Wanderer's (+Power, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Toughness) stats.
A recipe to make an ascended insignia for crafting armor with Minstrel's (+Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality) stats.
Looted from the Champion Risen Captain, found inside the Chapel of Lady Glaive in Straits of Devastation.
<c=@flavor>Caution: Contents extremely volatile. Authorization from Sabetha required.</c>
You must unlock the Mastery ability Ley-Line Gliding in the Gliding Mastery line to purchase this item.
A recipe to make an ascended insignia for crafting armor with Commander's (+Power, +Precision, +Toughness, and +Concentration) stats.
<c=@flavor>Resonates with the otherworldly power of Gorseval the Multifarious.</c>
Double-click to combine the venoms of a Canyon Spider Queen, Toxic Spider Queen, Enraged Spider Queen, and Gargantula in an Empty Hylek Flask to create the Arachnid Venom Decanter.

The waters in Forsaken Thicket are known to have cleansing properties that can cure various afflictions. Those who possess this Mastery can wash away their ailments and afflictions when the opportunity presents itself.
A gift used to create legendary armor.
Used in the crafting of armor with +Condition Damage, +Power, +Expertise, and +Precision.
Used in the crafting of weapons with +Condition Damage, +Power, +Expertise, and +Precision.
Gathered from orichalcum nodes. Refine into ingots.
The door has opened, providing an exit from this room.
A recipe to make an ascended inscription for crafting weapons with Trailblazer's (+Toughness, +Condition Damage, +Expertise, and +Vitality) stats.
Unlocked when player owns the Heart of Thorns expansion.
Follow the fourth player on the red team.
Double-click to choose a set of ascended armor.
Raids offer the ultimate challenge for you and nine of your friends.
A recipe to make an ascended insignia for crafting armor with Viper's (+Condition Damage, +Power, +Expertise, and +Precision) stats.
Collect a Flame Core from the chest after defeating Sabetha the Saboteur.
+75%% damage and 3s knockdown. 30%% chance to break.

Hero,

Your accomplishments are well known by the movers and shakers in society, such that it is widely regarded that you are ready to face the toughest enemies that threaten us. As reports come in from around Tyria, we will notify you via mail of the current threats. Our cartographers will continuously update the world map with the locations of these trouble spots with a red portal marked Raid." Inside these areas are myriad dangers that will require all the cunning, tactics, and strategy you can muster. When you're ready, head to one of these locations and speak with an informant. I caution you. You should rally a full squad to tackle these dangers, else you'll risk total failure.
Collide the core with unstable ley rifts.

Use the Searing Cauldron near Ironhead Lake in Iron Marches to combine the Wyvern's Liquid Fire, Elemental Flames, Destroyer's Heat, a Flame Effigy Band, and a Fire Imbued Heart, to create the Ultra Hot Sphere.

Double-click to combine the Volatile Spores, Bloodsucker Enzymes, Beetle Juice, Frothy Troll Saliva, Malodorous Mucus, and Salivary Stone in an Empty Hylek Flask to create the Concentrated Maguuma Bacteria.
Used in the crafting of weapons with +Expertise, +Vitality, and +Precision.
Speak with the Priestess of Dwayna, at the Plaza of Dwayna in Divinity's Reach, to purchase Pure Crystalline Phials.
Follow the fifth player on the blue team.
Show usable object names as overhead text.
Contains a rare or exotic piece of level 78â€“80 gear for revenants. Double-click to open.

Regenerate health.
<c=@reminder>Will be removed if you enter competitive PvP or a raid.</c>
After learning the special technique, defeat Gargantula inside the cave at Wynchona Woods in Harathi Hinterlands and loot her venom.
Year of the Ascension Part IV
<c=@flavor>This tube is a collection of reactive energies that have taken on a liquid form and could create a violent reaction if mixed with the right alchemical reactants.<c>
Used in the crafting of weapons with +Expertise.
Activate the Soul Battery Fragment before defeating Karas the Undying, west of Rayhan Bayt in Malchor's Leap, to capture its soul energy.
Greatly reduces non-siege weapon damage to cannons, mortars, and oil pots.
Bring your Raven Egg to the entrance of the Artesian Waters in Cursed Shore to bathe it in the water from the source.
A recipe to make an ascended inscription for crafting weapons with Minstrel's (+Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality) stats.
You have acquired the maximum amount of Magnetite Shards this week.
After learning the special technique, defeat the Enraged Spider Queen outside the mansion of Almuten Estates in Gendarran Fields and loot her venom.
